products.description_headline: The Sobakov offers a fiercely modern view on soccer culture. This version pays tribute to London's streetwear scene, influenced by the stylish flamboyance of soccer fans who compete by outdressing the opposition. Made of soft textile, these shoes flash an aggressive look with a textured outsole that angles into the upper. The swerving 3-Stripes that wrap from the heel recall the legendary Predator Accelerator cleat from 1998. Energy-returning Boost cushioning adds a responsive feel.

This version pays tribute to London's streetwear scene, influenced by the stylish flamboyance of soccer fans who compete by outdressing the opposition. Made of soft textile, these shoes flash an aggressive look with a textured outsole that angles into the upper. The swerving 3-Stripes that wrap from the heel recall the legendary Predator Accelerator cleat from 1998. Energy-returning Boost cushioning adds a responsive feel.

products.description_headline: Technical terrain support meets lightweight agility in these hiking shoes. Built for fluid movement in rugged terrain, the Boost midsole provides energy return from trailhead to summit while adapting to rocky, uneven ground. The mid-cut design features a textile upper with a GORE-TEX membrane to shed moisture while allowing your feet to breathe. A Continentalâ¢ Rubber outsole complements the responsive feel for confidence-inspiring traction in all conditions, wet or dry.
description_bullets: Continentalâ¢ Rubber outsole for extraordinary grip even in wet conditions; GORE-TEX lining for waterproof, breathable performance

products.description_headline: adidas throws it back to the late '90s when the Equipment Salvation first appeared. Inspired by the natural movement of the foot, these shoes were the first to feature the "Feet You Wear" design. This updated version comes with a full leather upper. Bold pops of color and a chunky profile give them a confident '90s attitude.
description_bullets: Textile lining; Rubber outsole; Stabilizing Torsion System

A woven tongue label pulled from the archives adds an authentic touch.
